ThirdPartyAccountLink.name: ThirdPartyAccountLink
ThirdPartyAccountLink.description: Represents the list of external users who authenticated using an authentication provider.

Handle.description: The username in the third-party system.

IsNotSsoUsable.description: Support for single sign-on.If true, the link can't be used for a single sign-on flow. It's only available OAuth access and refresh tokens.

RemoteIdentifier.description: The unique ID for the user in the third-party system.

SsoProvider.description: The foreign key to the AuthProvider of the third-party system.

SsoProviderId.description: The ID associated with the SsoProvider value.

SsoProviderName.description: The name associated with the AuthProvider of the third-party system, in case the user has no access to the provider foreign key (the SsoProvider value).

ThirdPartyAccountLinkKey.description: A concatenated string including the organization ID, the SsoProviderId value, the SsoProvider value, and the RemoteIdentifier value.

UserId.description: The Salesforce user associated with this third-party account link.
